name: Abby
introduction: Super Rock Star, Most Popular Singer
description: An exchange student who hates restrictions. She's the vocalist of an indie band and believes that rock music can spread love and freedom.

passiveSkill.name: Moonlight Punk
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Increases Abby's DMG to Sorcerer and Attack class by {placeholder}. Lineup Skill: Activation Requirement: Deploy Yasmine. Activation Effect: Reduces Abby's Energy cost by 1."}

uniqueSkill.name: Metal Ode to Joy
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Abby ignites her heart of rock 'n' roll, causing all enemy fans, other than the Leader, to rush forward until all empty slots are filled. After moving, deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to a row of enemies."}

specialSkill.name: Path√©tique Bash
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Abby bashes the ground with her guitar, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to an enemy and stuns him/her for 1 round.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Fate Movement
normalSkill.description: Deals {placeholder} of ATK damage to an enemy.
